about: Experienced Chief Financial Officer with a demonstrated history of working in the Telco, information technology and pharma industries. Hands-on experience in private equity and finance with executive and senior management roles. Skilled in Negotiation, Business Planning, Leveraged Finance, and M&A. Strong finance professional with a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) focused in Business & Administration from University of Genoa.
